About.paragraph: Georamic is a community of planners, engineers, data scientists and developers, working together on side projects, making geospatial analysis accessible along the way. Georamic is a platform of web-based tools that don’t require training or enterprise subscriptions; tools that let anyone, from a student to a city council member, quickly get a first look at what geospatial data says about their surroundings.
Why: Georamic meets every other Sunday! Dive into discussions on mobility, data, safety, AI, and development—let’s share, learn, and grow together.

Services.name: AccessLite
Services.text: A light weight isochrone based analysis tool for isochrone polygon generation, accessibility analysis, and more.

Services.name: SafeZones
Services.text: (Concept) A tool for recommending safety countermeasures near school zones based on crash data. School zone focused, data-driven safety insights, visualization, and actionable recommendations.

Services.name: PathWeave
Services.text: (Concept) A tool to build a rich database of the built environment, traffic, safety, socio-economic, weather, and other datasets for any location. It uses AI to analyze the surrounding built environment and curates data from public and external sources.

Testimonials.text: "What I like about Georamic is the community. These are highly motivated individuals with a mission and thats powerful"
Testimonials.name: Bhasme Don

Testimonials.text: "With AI making software writing more accessible, its a perfect time to build"
Testimonials.name: John Doe

Features.title: Tools
Features.text: Lightweight, web based, easy to use tools for geospatial analysis.

Features.title: Collaboration
Features.text: Professionals in the field of transportation, safety, urban planning, software development coming together to work on fun side projects.

Features.title: Community
Features.text: Building community around learning, teaching and building. Georamic meets virtually every other Sunday, everyone is invited to join.

Features.title: AI
Features.text: Building AI powered tools with powerful capabilities.
